task.title: Log in Linkus via QR Code

note.p: For security reason, your email server may intercept the QR code. If you don't receive the QR code, try to log in Linkus by other method.

step.cmd: Open the e-mail with the subject "Login Linkus Mobile Client" on your PC.
Open Linkus mobile client, tap the QR button, and scan the QR code in the e-mail.
step.info: The Linkus client will get the login information and log in automatically.
